DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the study is to identify changes in potential biomarkers after peptide immunotherapy for that may subsequently be developed as biomarkers that correlate with clinical efficacy.
DOC.brief_title: Identification of Potential Biomarkers of Response to Peptide Immunotherapy for Ragweed Allergy
DOC.criteria: Enrolled in study TR002 but have not yet commenced dosing None; no criteria additional to TR002 exclusion criteria are applicable to this study
